title: Bug 2694 - Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)
description:
Bug 2694 - Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)

When pressing 'Add' for the associated editors:

a. Enable multiple selection.

c. Mark the default entry in the associated editors list (with the label '(default)') similar to perspectives.

NOTES:
KLM (10/10/2001 1:54:57 PM)
Also:

f. Provide a width hint for the dialog.

g. Investigate why the File editors Pref page grows in height when it is selected, but no other pages behave the same way.

I have already fixed issues a, c, f. These fixes need to be released.

KLM (10/10/2001 5:58:58 PM)
I have released fixes for issues a, c, f, g.
OB: When pressing 'Add' for the associated editors, the behavior is unclear and there are no specific instructions given.
EB:
When pressing 'Add' for the associated editors, the following improvements should be made:

d. 'Add' should not add a hidden entry.

e. Entries that already exist in the associated editors should not be available for selection.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Editor Selection Dialog.
2. Press the 'Add' button.

To verify the fix for issue d:
1. Open the Editor Selection Dialog.
2. Press the 'Add' button.
3. Verify that no hidden entry is added.

To verify the fix for issue e:
1. Open the Editor Selection Dialog.
2. Press the 'Add' button.
3. Verify that entries that already exist in the associated editors are not available for selection.
